verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H0853"\w* end, \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* changed, \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* inscription \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* title, \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w himself|strong="H8104"\w*, \w for|strong="H7971"\w* doctrine,

\w When|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* fire \w to|strong="H0430"\w* Mesopotamia \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Syria \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Sobal \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Joab returned \w and|strong="H6965"\w* slew \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Edom, \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* vale \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* saltpits, twelve thousand men.

O God, thou hast cast \w us|strong="H5337"\w* off, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* hast destroyed \w us|strong="H5337"\w*; thou hast been angry, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* hast \w had|strong="H0376"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H0376"\w* \w us|strong="H5337"\w*.

Thou hast moved \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hast troubled \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: heal thou \w the|strong="H5921"\w* breaches thereof, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* moved.
Thou hast shewn thy \w people|strong="H7200"\w* hard things; thou hast \w made|strong="H3559"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w* drink wine \w of|strong="H5771"\w* sorrow.

Thou hast given \w a|strong="H3068"\w* warning \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6485"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* fear thee: \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* flee \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w before|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bow: \w That|strong="H3605"\w* thy beloved \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* delivered.
Save \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H7725"\w* thy right hand, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* hear \w me|strong="H7725"\w*.

God hath \w spoken|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* holy place: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* rejoice, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* divide Sichem; \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* mete \w out|strong="H5042"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* vale \w of|strong="H6310"\w* tabernacles.

Galaad \w is|strong="H3068"\w* mine, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Manasses \w is|strong="H3068"\w* mine: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Ephraim \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* strength \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* head. Juda \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* king:

Moab \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* pot \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* hope. \w Into|strong="H0413"\w* Edom \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* stretch \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* shoe: \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H8104"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* made subject.

\w Who|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w bring|strong="H6923"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w into|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* strong city? \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* lead \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w into|strong="H7200"\w* Edom?

Wilt \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*, \w who|strong="H7911"\w* hast cast \w us|strong="H6435"\w* \w off|strong="H3381"\w*? \w and|strong="H3381"\w* wilt \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*, \w go|strong="H3381"\w* out \w with|strong="H3381"\w* \w our|strong="H0136"\w* \w armies|strong="H2428"\w*?
Give \w us|strong="H5608"\w* help \w from|strong="H1697"\w* trouble: \w for|strong="H1697"\w* vain \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* salvation \w of|strong="H1697"\w* man.

\w Through|strong="H0776"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w do|strong="H0369"\w* mightily: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w bring|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w nothing|strong="H0369"\w* \w them|strong="H3615"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* afflict \w us|strong="H3045"\w*.
